m_descr:
This app sends all notifications to your mobile phone using the free Russian SMS portal SMS.ru. Please note that this service is available for Russia only.

Settings:
  • Fill in your mobile phone number
  • Define the prefix of the SMS messages to be sent
  • Insert the access key you will receive when signing up for the service.
description: Send SMS via SMS.ru gateway. To register enter your phone number, name and password on http://sms.ru/?panel=register and confirm your phone number with a code.
l_phone: Phone number to send SMS. In form of 79261234567
h_api_key: After registration on the right you will see api_id (looks like a43f6376-f57d-27e4-5981-ec48945d871f)
rl_hidden: Hide the created widget on elements view.
